DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Assess common genetic mutation tumor germline DNA sample patient head neck squamous cell carcinoma ( HNSCC ) . - Search viral DNAs relate information demographic , tumor characteristic , patient prognosis . - Search novel viral sequence cancer-associated gene mutation young nonsmoking HNSCC patient distinct head neck cancer . - Determine tumor suppressor gene mutation HNSCC patient relate information gene expression data . - Validate gene expression information use independent technique real-time PCR express sequence immunohistochemistry . OUTLINE : Genetic mutation analysis gene expression study perform tissue sample patient head neck squamous cell carcinoma . Techniques use include real time-PCR immunohistochemistry .
